sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Reported speech review:

la .alis. cusku lu coi li'u = ?
la .bob. cusku lo se du'u ri klama = ?

(Answers: Alice says "Hello", Bob says that he goes)

New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
daplu x1 is an island in water x2 island
lalxu x1 is a lake at location x2 lake
snime x1 is snow/ice at location x2 snow/ice

Descriptive Tanru

Combine words for vivid descriptions:

lo blanu tsani

The blue sky.

lo barda cmana

The big mountain.

lo lenku snime

The cold snow.

Full Scene Description

lo solri cu carmi gapru lo blanu tsani
.i lo cmana cu barda je melbi
.i lo snime cu blabi nenri lo cmana
.i lo lalxu cu blanu ne'a lo cmana
.i lo cipni cu vofli nenri lo tsani

The sun shines brightly above the blue sky. The mountain is big and beautiful. White snow is inside the mountain. A blue lake is near the mountain. Birds fly in the sky.

Using Position Words

lo tricu cu zunle lo lalxu
.i lo cmana cu trixe lo tricu
.i lo solri cu gapru ro da

The tree is to the left of the lake. The mountain is behind the tree. The sun is above everything.

Key Point

Use tanru for descriptions, position words for layout, and multiple sentences for complete scenes.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Descriptive Tanru

Translate:

  1. The blue lake.
  2. The big island.
  3. The white snow.
Answers
  1. lo blanu lalxu
  2. lo barda daplu
  3. lo blabi snime

Exercise 2: Scene Elements

Translate:

  1. The sun is above the mountain.
  2. The lake is near the island.
  3. Snow is on the ground.
Answers
  1. lo solri cu gapru lo cmana
  2. lo lalxu cu ne'a lo daplu
  3. lo snime cu cpana lo tumla

Exercise 3: Write a Scene

Describe a scene with at least 4 sentences:

Example Answer 
lo nicte cu co'a
.i lo lunra cu carmi gapru lo tsani
.i lo tarci cu so'i je melbi
.i lo lalxu cu blanu je calme
.i lo tumla cu cnita lo snime

(Night began. The moon shines above the sky. The stars are many and beautiful. The lake is blue and calm. The ground is under snow.)

items.text: The sun is above the mountain.
The lake is near the island.

Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Describe a scene aloud:

Describe what you see (real or imagined):

  • Sky
  • Land features
  • Weather/time

Summary

You practiced descriptive writing using tanru and position words to create vivid scenes.
